Dengan kondisi Pandemic Covid-19 ini, saya tidak jadi khawatir ketika berlibur ke daerah Cikarang karena ada Grand Zuri Jababeka yg mempersiapkan Standar Kebersihan yg baik untuk saya & keluarga.

Lokasi hotel ini sangat strategis. Depan hotel ada Living Plaza. Dekat dengan Gerbang Tol Cikarang Barat. Dekat dengan Ind* & *lfa mart juga.

Proses di FO untuk Check-In cepat. Bell-Boy ramah & cekatan. Kamar 901 dalam kondisi baik & dengan pemandangan kota yg bagus. Tim Housekeeping nya telaten. Dan, semua staff menyapa kami ketika bertemu di Lobby/Lift/Lorong. Menu sarapan, enak (terutama bubur ayam, fillet & omellete)

Namun, ada 1 hal yg membuat saya kurang nyaman. Ketika saya & keluarga, mengunjungi Cerenti Restaurant untuk sarapan. Semua berjalan baik, kemudian ada seorang karyawan yg menyela perbincangan seru kami untuk meminta review, dengan nada "nyusu-nyusu" kebetulan koneksi HP saya & ayah, lagi lambat. Dan, sy mengatakan untuk menulis review di kamar saja. Namun, sepertinya staff tsb "kekeuh" ingin saat itu juga untuk me-review hotel ini. Karena, dia butuh bukti foto review kami. Akhirnya, dengan terpaksa, saya memberikan review seadanya di Google (akan saya update lagi).

Terimakasih Grand Zuri Jababeka atas sambutannya.
title: Pilihan Terbaik untuk Staycation, tapi...

text:
Saya datang sudah jam 8 malam, dan dengan alasan penuh saya dapat kamar smoking di lantai 5.
Pas masuk lorong, yaaa sedikit bau asap..tapi gak papa.
Begitu masuk kamarnya, saya kecewaa sekali bayar 420rb buat semalam disini.
Bau kayak hotel melati, meja berdebu, pembuat kopi yang sudah cukup usang, bahkan telpon yang bermasalah(saat menelepon harus lurusin kabel). Kamar mandi juga baunya gak segar.
Pelayanan ramah sih.
Kolam renang bersih dan ada kolam anak.
Mana katanya sarapan terkenal enak?Makanan tidak vatiatif, tidak ada rasa nikmat nya..Bikin kopi saja encer kayak air saja.Kue kecilnya juga rasanya engga pas gitu..intinya saya makan nggak ada yang bikin nafsu.
Jadi kalau dari saya, ini kan hotel lama..kalau gak kepepet,masih banyak hotel batu yang mungkin lebih worth it dengan harga.

text: Sudah 3 kali menginap disini untuk staycation! Hotel yang nyaman untuk santai-santai karena fasilitasnya lumayan lengkap. Saya suka sama pool nya dan kolam air panas di kamar ganti toilet wanita. Ada saunanya juga walaupun agak kecil tapi lumayan lah. Ada kolam buat anak-anak juga! Hanya saja pada saat di pool handuk tidak tersedia dan harus bawa dari kamar. Untuk lokasi hotelnya sangat strategis dekat ke pusat kuliner dan daerah ramai. Untuk breakfast sangat variatif (sampai ada sushi segala) rasanya pun enak dan sangat tasty! Gak nyesel lah staycation disini. Dan pasti akan balik lagi kesini kalo untuk staycation. Dan untuk kamar ukurannya luas, acnya dingin walaupun kalau baru buka kamar agak lama dinginnya, saya pesan kamar dengan bathub tapi untuk bathubnya lama sekali saluran pembuangan airnya seperti macet. Oia dan hairdryernya sangat bising sekali suaranya. Overall saya favorit sih sama hotel grand zuri.. langganan staycation saya dab teman-teman saya!
title: Langganan untuk Staycation!

text: Saya memilih hotel ini karena saya pernah menginap di grand zuri palembang dan pekanbaru sehingga tertarik untuk menginap, pertimbangan lain karena membaca review dari trveler dengan konklusi rata-rata"Baik" terutama pool untuk anak2 dan bathtub. Check in jam 14.30, lancar diberikan room sesuai pesanan dengan balkon lantai 3 dekat pool dan gym,  kira2 jam 15.00 pintu tiba-tiba dibuka, untung dalam posisi tergrendel. ternyata yang membuka adalah bagian housekeeping kamar (walaupun mereka telah meminta maaf) saya hanya berpikir keras, apakah tidak ada koordinasi antara bagian reception dan housekeeping tentang tamu yang telah check-in? bagaimana kalau waktu itu tamu sedang tidak dalam berpakaian? WHAT IT WILL SHAME US..kembali ke hotel, pool side nyaman di gunakan apalagi dipisah untuk anak dan dewasa, bathtub bersih, 1 hal lagi yang saya soroti adalah "breakfast"... diluar ekspektasi saya :(..how come there was many carbo menu on maincourse (nasi putih, nasi goreng, nasi kuning, kentang) dan hanya 1 menu protein yakni ayam (dengan rasa yang biasa) dan tidak ada sausages/bacon or menu meat. menu porridge pun terasa adem sehingga tidak menggugah untuk disantap pada sendokan berikutnya. Secara overall ketika sedang dalam perjalanan pulang terbersit pikiran apakah saya baru mengingap di hotel bintang 4 atau hotel bintang 2.

title: Hotel bagus

text: Hotel ini berada di lokasi bisnis yang strategis, yaitu dekat pintu masuk kawasan industri jababeka 2. Harganya juga cukup logical untuk level bintang 4. Sarapannya cukup beragam. Kamarnya tidak terlalu luas, tapi cukup baik. Namun sayang interiornya banyak yang kurang rapi, wallpaper ada yang sudah melotok, dan di beberapa sisi dinding cukup banyak bercak2. Ada kemungkinan hotel juga tidak membedakan smoking dan non-smoking room sehingga ruangan masih berbau bekas asap rokok. Secara keseluruhan, masih worth it dengan harga yang dibayar.
title: Lokasi strategis, hotelnya sih biasa saja

text:
Yang cukup mengganggu sewaktu menginap di hotel ini adalah menunggu ketersediaan kamar yang hampir 2 jam. Seharusnya jika kamar sudah ready, tamu langsung dipanggil dan tidak perlu sampai kita menghampiri lagi meja Front Office untuk menanyakan lagi apakah kamar sudah ready or not.

Untuk kamar cukup nyaman dan luas dan kualitas breakfast juga oke. Lokasi bagus karena tidak jauh dari gerbang Jababeka 2. Dalam kamar juga tersedia Mini Bar dan table water heater untuk menyeduh teh atau kopi.

text:
- Semua staff sangat ramah dan cepat tanggap ke tamu. 
- Kamarnya cukup luas, bersih dan nyaman! Dan saya dapat kamar dengan view jalan raya depan hotel dan waktu malam itu bagus lho viewnya, seperti di Vegas! Hehehe

Tapi, ada poin minus dari saya:

Waktu check in, ternyata saya salah tanggal booking, dimana tanggal check in saya sudah lewat. Tapi front office coba membantu konfirmasi ke bagian reservasi dan mereka mengijinkan saya untuk check in di hari itu tanpa harus saya membayar lagi.

text:
Berlokasi di pusat kota Jababeka, sebetulnya cukup banyak pilihan hotel lain di sekitarnya. Namun, kami memilih Grand Zuri karena fasilitas yang menarik dan harga yang sangat terjangkau.

Kami menginap satu malam di kamar deluxe twin lantai 9. Ukuran kamar standar, dengan fasilitas standar hotel bintang 4. Kekurangannya menurut saya hanya lantai keramik kamar mandi yang kurang ok. 

Sarapan pagi rasanya enak, variasi menu cukup banyak. Sayangnya pada saat kami makan beberapa menu buffet, buah, dan jus buah sudah habis, padahal baru jam 8. Yang terbaik dari hotel ini menurut saya adalah sport facilitiesnya. Fitness centre cukup lengkap alatnya, kolam renang besar, ditambah sauna dan jacuzzi yang bisa dinikmati secara gratis.

Walaupun ada kesan pertama kurang menyenangkan dengan petugas security, overall kami puas menginap di Grand Zuri Jababeka.

text: Dengan adanya hotel Grand Zuri Cikarang ini, saya semakin bersemangat untuk melakukan kegiatan kantor/bisnis di area ini. Namun , pemandangan dari dalam kamar ke luar terasa kurang menyenangkan karena memang hotel ini berada di kawasan industri. Satu hal lagi yang menarik di hotel ini adalah Sport Center. Kolam renang yang cukup untuk berolah raga dan juga gym tersedia di sini. Ditambah lagi ruangan Jacuzzi/Whirlpool dan ruang sauna membuat olahraga di sini menjadi sangat menyenangkan.

text:
Saya pernah tinggal di hotel ini, di kamar yang cukup berkelas, dan menurut saya hotel ini sangat bersih dan staf cukup perhatian.
Hiburan malamnya luar biasa.
Baru-baru ini kami memesan hotel ini untuk salah satu konferensi penjualan kami dan acaranya sukses.
Satu kekurangannya adalah belanja, tapi tidak terlalu buruk.
Saya akan terus tinggal di hotel ini kapanpun saya berada di sekitar sana karena harganya bagus.
title: Harganya bagus

text:
Memasuki hotel yang terletak di kawasan industri Jababeka Cikarang ini, kami berharap untuk mendapat pelayanan profesional yang terbaik, tapi sayangnya kami dikecewakan oleh pelayanan yang mereka berikan. Informasi yang tidak jelas dan tindakan yang sangat lamban dalam menyelesaikan masalah. 
Saya di sana untuk menyelenggarakan rapat dan pertemuan internasional, dengan orang-orang yang sangat penting atau pengusaha internasional yang menginvestasi uang mereka di Indonesia. Kami berharap kami bisa memuaskan mereka dengan pelayanan terbaik dan profesionalisme. Sayangnya, kacau balau, sound system tidak bekerja dengan baik, mikrofon tidak bekerja dengan baik, presentasi selalu terganggu, dan tidak ada tindakan cepat untuk mengatasi masalah-masalah tersebut.
Yang paling parah adalah makan malam setelah rapat, makan malam paling tidak enak yang pernah saya makan! Terlihat seperti makanan di warung pinggir jalanl!!
Mereka memberi menu pada orang yang salah, kami tidak mendapat apa yang kami pesan dan yang paling parah adalah kami menunggu sangat lama untuk pesanan dari VVIP dan ketika makanan datang staf memberi mereka menu yang salah, dan minuman yang mereka pesan tidak datang sampai mereka telah selesai makan! Makan malam yang memalukan dan acara yang berantakan!
Ketika kami mencoba mempercepat prosesnya, tidak ada alasan dan permintaan maaf, mereka bahkan tidak mau mendengar protes kami!
Mengapa hotel yang berada di kawasan bisnis tidak memberi layanan profesional....? Sangat buruk!
title: Hotel dengan Pelayanan Buruk

text: Hotel ini adalah hotel standar, dengan kamar yang cukup luas. Kamarnya bersih dan rapi. Lokasinya berada di dekat kawasan industri, sehingga Anda tidak dapat bepergian ke sekitarnya jika tidak memiliki kendaraan. Sarapannya biasa saja dan sebagian besar menunya diulang-ulang hampir setiap hari. Pilihannya terbatas.
title: Hotel standar untuk perjalanan bisnis yang dekat dengan kawasan industri

text:
Grand Zuri di Jababeka, sekitar 30 menit dari Bekasi, tergantung pada lalu lintas di jalan tol, telah menjadi hotel favorit saya jika saya ada pertemuan di Cibitung/Cikarang.

Biasanya check in cepat dan mudah, seluruh pegawai terlatih baik, membantu dan tersenyum hangat.

Kamarnya cukup baik, cukup besar dengan fasilitas yang memadai, perawatan kamarnya teratur.

Di samping ruang duduk ada restoran, yang menyediakan berbagai macam rasa, meskipun kadang dapurnya tidak benar-benar memenuhi harapan saya. Kemantapan makanannya dapat ditingkatkan.

Sarapan paginya cukup baik, akses internet tanpa kabel (gratis!) tersedia di seluruh hotel.

Kolam renang dan pusat kebugaran kecil tersedia gratis untuk para tamu hotel. Jika Anda menginap lebih lama, pelayanan cuci pakaiannya efisien dan tidak terlalu mahal.

Satu-satunya kekurangan hotel ini adalah adanya klub malam di lantai bawah, Anda perlu kamar di lantai yang lebih tinggi dari lantai 7, jika tidak suara dari klub malam mungkin mengganggu tidur Anda - tetapi, mungkin orang lain menyukainya.

Jika Anda memerlukan hiburan setelah bekerja dan Anda tidak keberatan mengemudi selama 30 menit, Lippo adalah tempat yang harus dikunjungi, dengan banyak macam restoran, pub, bar dan tempat karaoke.
title: Kota kecil, tetapi hotel bagus.

text:
Hotel berada di area industri, apabila anda bekerja disana - Ini merupakan hal bagus. (Dibandingkan berangkat dari Jakarta)

Kamar sedikit minimalis (atau kosong),  kamar mandi cukup bagus, dan Anda dapat mendengarkan sedikit suara dari jalanan.

Restoran cukup bagus - Sarapan juga baik.
title: Cukup baik - Namun tidak terlalu hebat.

text:
I love the ambience of this hotel.
Although sometimes I was bothered by noises from outside the hotel (since it's location is facing the main street), but it's still acceptable.

The location is good, rooms were clean, bed & pillows were comfortable. Aircon, hot shower, WiFi & TV Channels were good.

Breakfast quite good, the gym and the pool were fun.

This is one of my favorite hotels in Jababeka.

text:
Stayed here on 29 December 2016 only for one night.
The location is easy to reach, right across Plaza Jababeka or Damri bus shelter.

Room ok, comfort enough. And have refrigerator inside.
But wifi cannot work well at room, so I just use my provider card.

Bathroom ok, love the divided space between shower and the floor outside the shower.

Tv channels ok.

Hotel have swimming pool, quite ok, but I didn't try swim there.

But there are none food places around the hotel, the closest is McDonalds and you need to walk around 20 minutes.

Breakfast not that good enough.

Overall, its Ok and comfort hotel..

text: This was our second experience staying in Grand Zuri chain hotel after Dumai branch. The main important treasure still their employees. Well done, in remembering our names, in giving great hospitality. I checked out with my kids and the girl staff didnt hesitate to help me stroll the kids to the main lobby, with smile. Too bad i didnt have chance to taste their breakfast because bringing toddlers can make a lot of mess and i was tired. But my husband left a message to the front office that he must go at 4:00am to catch a flight, then he got some pastries, the croissant tastes good. About the room: a little dusty, the floor is the worst; fake wooden floor that is slippery my todds keep on falling down when walking, not children friendly as a lot of pointy edges on its furnitures, and all glass window wall makes some parents must aware. Bathroom: dusty! I must spread some water to remove the dust from the floor, but the shower & water pulse is good. Overall, this is best suited for business trip/couple/family with bigger kids. Will i stay again? Yes. Value for money and great location near from some point: factories (mattel, etc), army sites right in the sides, foods (mcdonalds, restoran padang, etc) in walking distance.
title: Easy, simple & nice

Food at restaurant is quiet simple. Breakfast is sufficient. Given the price for the stay is very attractive. 

The lounge is not fully utilized. But you can still get a beer and listen to your favorite YouTube music. 

The hotel staff is amazing. They are polite, attentive and helpful. Very quick to arrange your needs. Shuttle to nearby industrial area is well planned. 

Overall simple place. Competition from the many hotels now operating in Jababeka area has caught up.

text:
Let's be fair. The hotel is clean, people is nice, the SPA and the gym are good enough, the room service is diligent, laundry works perfectly, breakfast is a bit too local for my taste but everyone can grab a bite...

The problem for me is that this is an industrial area. Most of the people I meet in the hotel are sleeping here for business, in particular foreigners like me. Stable Room WIFI should be a minimum in this kind of hotel; We want to send Emails, Skype with the family or see Netflix in our room. But even after three days of complains, 90  % of the time WIFI doesn't work properly at any room in our floors (We were in floor 7, we heard the same of floor 9), even more incredible when it works nice in the lobby... 

That reason makes impossible to us to return to this hotel in the future, and it's a pity. A router is cheap and easy to install (most hotels now have individual routers each room...). Until that happens, I can not recommend this one when you want to have some office time in your room.

To conclude let me include a photo that describe what will be my memory of this hotel if nothing is fixed the next few days...
title: No WIFI, no business

text:
Stayed here for one night, was given room on the 8th floor with superb view!

The room was large and nice. Clean and fresh smelling and cool.(Location wise: just so-so) 

The bed was soft and comfortable (maintenance issue: bed squeaking – needs to be fixed) and the steaming hot shower was much appreciated!

Quite nice breakfast option, taste was not bad, food refilling speed needs attention and waiting staff was courteous. 

Corridor was nice and carpeted, but little bit hot. The infinity swimming pool was clear-blue & clean and at just the right temperature. They also have not-to-be-missed indoor fitness spot, Jacuzzi and sauna.

Overall the hotel was very good and so their facilities, the only setback was the service which still needs some touch-up.

text:
Grand Zuri is still one of the best places to stay if you are on business in the greater Cikarang area.
This place offers comfortable rooms, nice selection of breakfast spread, meanwhile they even offer a decent bread selection besides the standard white bread which enhances the breakfast. Further to this you can opt to have freshly brewed (real) coffee for breakfast, another plus point.
However, Grand Zuri is not without competition anymore as it was two or three years ago. More new hotels nearby have already opened or are going to open soon, so it becomes a traveler's choice.
But out of historic experience I still prefer this place if i need to be in the Cikarang area.

text:
My stay here was booked by a friend whose son's wedding was organised in this hotel. 

I came late at night and was given a room which strongly smelled of tobacco (Room 318), have dirty floor, marred with cigarette ashes, have cigarette ashtray on its coffee table and have dustbin that was full of waste. Since I am asthmatic and is allergic to cigarette smell, i complaint immediately to the reception staff, asking for a room on a non smoking floor. At first they (reception staffs) said the hotel was fully booked and therefore they could not grant my request. After that they told me they were going to clean the room to get rid of the tobacco smell.

I told them, if I could not get a suitable room for me to stay I might have to change to other hotel. Suddenly Room 316 was available for me and they ask me to check the room, to see whether that was ok with me. Room 316 was better as the cigarette smell was not so strong and the room was cleaner. And so I agreed to stay at Room 316.

I found that the staff (most probably the supervisor; sorry I did not get his name, but he wore dark colored jacket and wearing red neckties) looked concern about my complaint and at least trying to accommodate my request. Other than that I did not have other problem with this hotel.

Breakfast and lunch foods was ok. The toilets in the room and at the common area were clean and well maintained. The staffs in general were helpful and polite.

The location of the hotel is good as a shopping mall is located just across the road and in front of the hotel; good to find foods and buy souvenirs.
title: Had a happy stay

text:
The location of the hotel might be convenient, the facilities and the price. 

Upon check in, receptionist tried to be nice and make a small talk asking my room preference (which obviously) has been stated on my booking preference (appreciate her kind gesture). That day, hotel was crowded hosting some events including breakfasting with the orphans at the front parking lot.  

We were so happy to have the room as we preferred, the room was ok – good size and clean. 

On the flip side, the bed sheets was clean but rather scratchy, we made a request to change them which was not done. the bed was squeaky with every movement. We were provided one set of amenities & slipper for two occupants.  

The wireless in the room was not that ok, patchy and required to keep logging in all the time (I gave it up). The aircon was poor and the room was quite hot, it took a very long time to cool the room. We actually made a complaint, they managed to at least fix it.

Whenever I take a shower, the bathroom always flooded. Good water pressure with intermittent temperature. Shower heads in needs of immediate cleaning, looks ugly. The hair dryer noise was like an old jet engine sound (super annoying!) 

Night receptionists (can’t recall this young lady’s name) were very unfriendly, we didn’t appreciate her tone and facial expressions. 
 
All the while my both stays here; great facilities and location. Service always seems erratic with extremely bored & unfriendly face around. 

Side note: customer service excellence has always been and will always be one of the critical competitive advantages in this industry. Let's improve. 

(Readers discretion advised.)
title: Not so good second time around

text:
Although only a two night stay, it started ok friendly check in etc.I was out all the next day and when I got back to my room there was a hole in the ceiling that had leaked water obviously most of the day by the amount that was there. 
I caught two housekeeping personnel that were in the area and informed them and they just sort of started running around in circles with no clue what to do (a mop would have been handy!)
I went back to the front desk and reported it to them, in the vain hope that something would happen. Meanwhile my colleague and I decided to take the hotel up on their offer of a welcome drink voucher provided at check in, turned out it was for a very small glass of orange juice, I couldn't even get it changed for a glass of water, so don't expect anything else but OJ.
Transpires almost two hours later that the GM who just so happened to have been loafing around in the same lounge, introduced himself. 
I then asked him what the story was with the OJ, and no substitutions and also if he would check on the status of my room repair....guess what...yep.. he came back and said we will have to get someone to go up and take a look, this is 2 hrs after it was reported.
Anyway from the lounge to the restaurant for dinner. Decided to take the simple option and have a burger, this was obviously my next mistake, the burger was cold as was the toasted bun it came on, oh yes and there was no sign of the onions and mushrooms that were supposed to be on it, in fact it was so cold that it didn't even warm the slice of cheese that was slapped on top never mind melt it. Back it went for another try, couldn't be bothered with sending it back again.
The hotel itself is clean, however don't expect much in the way of service or action on issues should you have any.
title: Short stay went south

text:
Had to stay there because it's close to work, and had to avoid the traffic from/to Jakarta.

The staff are very friendly, but they lack professionalism that I have seen in other 4 star hotels. 

The pool has no filtering, gym is good, minibar not much choice...

They use a pirated copy of Microsoft Office on their printer PC, and this should be really avoided. 

Not much choice for the western dishes which are average. Pasta is never cooked right, if it was available in the first place. They don't have spaghetti on most days. Breakfast is average, not much choice for western cuisine.
title: Cheap decor, very friendly but amateur staff

text: Those who choose to stay in this hotel, which sits among the urban sprawl, business parks and bonded warehouses outside of Jakarta, are not exactly on holiday.  I would even venture to say that most of the guests are here against their wishes.  Who wants to be surrounded by grim factories when there are tantalizing beaches so close...and yet so far?  But if one must be here, then this is a decent place to rest one's feet.  It's cheap - yet evokes a minimalist / expensive air that one would expect with a more expensive hotel.  And dinner (which, in my case, was a California roll to start, then the teriyaki salmon) was quite tasty.  My suggestion on the dinner menu, however, would be to include a more varied wine list.  To date, the choices are two:  "house red" and "house white."  And, in the morning, I was able to get an excellent espresso.  But what was very disappointing during my short stay was the service.  Check-out process was excruciatingly inefficient (including asking your room number to have someone physically check the mini-bar... shuffling lots of paper in the interim... and then proceeding to perform about 15 paper-based processes, including the ever-so-painful putting of the bill into the envelope, which tends to take about 3.5 minutes.)   Getting something ironed was challenging, and involved a game of pictionary that rivals the scene in When Harry Met Sally.  And ordering drinks during dinner was, frankly, bizarre.  Disappointed in the wine choices, we each ordered a beer and a bottle of water.  The water came and proceeded to give me (the female) the two bottles of water, and my colleague (the male) the two beers.  I guess girls don't usually drink beer in these parts...
title: Slick decor, tasty sushi dinner, but slow service

text:
a great hotel in the industrial area of cikarang..a sumptuous breakfast served with attentive staff.
the hotel has a spa service..recommended to use it.
a supermarket is right opposite the hotel for basic groceries and food stuff.
title: in the heart of the industrial area of cikarang..

text: This is a hotel with modern-minimalist look outside and inside. In the room we stayed in, the floor was not covered with carpet – only plain ceramic. It may give cleaner impression but it feels cold. Worse, in the bathroom, there was no soap basket or something we can put soap/shampoo bottle on. Thus, taking shower here is not comfortable at all. In other hotels, with the same room rate, we can get a much better room and bathroom. Location-wise, it is close to Jababeka industrial area but far (20 mins driving) from the town’s shopping/dining area. The service was not bad but a bit inconsistent in quality. For instance, we were using the hotel’s transportation service to get us to (and pick us up from) a business venue everyday for 4 days. When there was a change in schedule on the last day, the driver failed to pick us up on time from the venue although we already informed about the change to another driver (the one who brought us to the venue in the morning). And, when we were checking out, the receptionist asked us for a hotel’s guide book that we never took away from the room. I had to come back to the room only to show them that the guide book was still there intact. Apparently, the receptionist got that information from a staff who inspected another room. Staying here may be best only for those who have business in the Jababeka industrial area nearby.
title: Average Service

photos.caption: Shower booth with no soap basket

text:
Modern and cleaned hotel close to the industrial area. Not many chances for visit the city by walk. It's about 1 hour and half faraway from the down city of Jakarta. The girls at the reception are friendly and ready to give you all the informations you need. 
Inside the restaurant you can find Indonesian, chinese and western style food, but can't find large choose 
Wifii is included and have good service
title: Enjoing relax

text:
New and clean. And seems more upscale compared to the nearby Grand Cikarang. But it's still only a 2.5 star hotel which is mostly catering factories nearby. 

I was given a standard room, without all the whistle and bell. I am quite happy with the cleanness of the room. The flooring is made of ceramic (not carpet - which is good for cleanness), and the bathroom is only basic white ceramic with shower only. All are quite ok but I was quite surprised that there was no slippers nor bathrobe in the room. Even though basic hotel, but slipper is necessary since the floor tend to be cold.

I requested softer pillow (they only provided 2 hard pillow - like a budget hotel!), but did not get it. And requested double bed but assigned twin instead. 

There is no proper desk, so in room dining is tight. And the breakfast is not great either.

In summary, it is ok to be used if you need to visit the factories nearby, but don't expect stellar facility. It is more proper to be named Zuri Express instead of Grand Zuri.
title: New and clean, but quite basic

text:
The best with this hotel is the location and that's all.
From service you will expect more. They want to be a 4 star hotel but can even reach 3 stars.
The room is clean but you feel like in a hospital.
Breakfast is not good at all. Better have a smaller selection and make it good instead.
Still improved since the last visit for a couple of year ago. At that time it was newly opened.
title: Hotel with good location in Jababeka.

text:
I liked hotel perfect for business travel. below are some points you want to know

Location : Grand Zuri hotel is located in Industrial area and takes approx 1.5 hours to reach for Jakarta Airport - depends on traffic.

Food : It has 1 restaurant opposite reception area - food is good though not many choice but sitting arrangement is not so, its rectangular in shape. Japanese, Korean, Indonesian food is available.

Rooms: rooms are spacious and well illuminated, amenities are enough additional alarm clock would be nice - No carpets on the floor. twin bed is enough for average person, some rooms may not have bath tub.

Staff : Staff is friendly and can talk English.

Internet : speed is okay compared to other locations in Indonesia via Wifi. 
 
Property : hotel was recently built so you can feel newness of it. every thing is so fresh.

overall this hotel is good for business stay and being in industrial area there are no major attraction around the hotel.
title: Neat and Clean for Business Travel

text: This is a good hotel which is near to the Cikarang industrial area. The food at the restaurant is quite delicious and value for money. However the location is situated in a busy road and no shopping mall nearby except Tesco which is opposite the hotel. Nice room and very clean with good service. Would recommend for business travelers but not those on vacation with families and small kids.
title: Pleasant stay for business trip

text: This is a new hotel, and compare to the others in the surrounding industrial areas, it is definetely value for money. Service is good throughout. Room takes a minimalist approach but is clean and decent. There is no bathtub though not much of a concern for me. Minibar is well-stocked for those who requires it. The room is generally quiet. There are swimming pool and gym, as well as massage. The lounge area where u get ur welcome room is cool too. Wireless signal is not a problem as well. Nothing much to complaint about. The only problem is traffic can be bad among the roads nearby, though of no fault of the hotel. There is also limited food options in the hotel and the mall nearby.
title: A New hotel that is good

text: Ho soggiornato qui una notte e mi sono trovato bene, nessun intoppo. Stanza pulita ed ordinata, personale di servizio molto cordiale, ristorante e colazione a buffet di buona qualità. Si trova a 30 min dalla zona industriale, molto comodo per chi è in viaggio per lavoro.

text:
JABABEKA工業団地内の中心付近にあるホテル。
周囲には複数のホテルや飲食店もあり、
飲食店やショッピングセンターが充実しているLIPPO Chikarangまでも車で15分程度で便利。
ブルーバードタクシーも周辺で待機している。
ホテルのフロントの両替は、レートが空港並みなので、
JAKARTA市内や周辺で両替所を探しておいた方が良い。
フロントスタッフは英語でコミュニケーションが取れる。
部屋は清潔。多少、館内で流れる音楽がずっと聞こえるが、ギリギリ邪魔にならない程度。
シャワーの温度はぬるい。
WIFIが無料だが、よく切れるのでLINEやメールはタイムリーに届かない。
朝5時位に最寄りのモスクから大音量のお知らせが流れるので、目覚まし代わりになるがもう少しゆっくり寝られる方には迷惑でしかないだろう。
外の音は良く聞こえて、6時位からは車のクラクション音が聞こえてくる。
朝食は6時からで、品数豊富。
エッグ・ヌードルカウンターで、ミーゴレンを作ってくれたがこれが美味しかった。
現地企業の手配で泊まったが、ネットで予約すると半額近くのプロモーション価格がある。
title: 渋滞に合わずに工業団地訪問は価値あり。

text:
チカランではホテルがいつも満室でしたが、最近は新たにOPENの宿が多くなり泊まりやすいです。
部屋は清潔で問題なく、朝食も選択肢は多くあり外人でも難なく宿泊できます。　前までは徒歩では夕食に困る立地でしたが、隣のコンプレックスに日本食屋もできて歩いて行けます。プールも4階（だったかな？）にあり、土や蚊に悩むことなく入れます。
title: このエリアでは10000円で泊まる高級ホテル

owner_response.text:
clubmn_km 様

この度は、チカラン滞在にてHotel Grand Zuriをご選択頂き、当ホテルについてのコメントも頂き、誠にありがとうございます。


私共が提供する施設を始め、部屋の清潔さ、朝食メニューのバリエーションや立地の良さまで当ホテルとご一緒に難なくご利用頂けたこと、大変嬉しく思います。

再度チカランへお越しの際、私共とご宿泊する予定でしたら、是非私し gm.jbbk@grandzuri.com まで直接お問い合わせください。ご予約の手配をお手伝い致します。

text: Sarò breve, se finite nella parte sx dell hotel vi aspetta la prima sveglia alle 04,45 del mattino ( preghiera) e poi alle 6.00 ( caserma). Il servizio è al minimo tabellare. Il bar alla sera è deserto e triste. La cucina è passabile ma il prezzo dei piatti a mio avviso eccessivo. Ia camera a parte il bagno datato è ok.
title: Così così

text:
きれいな外観、広いロビー。
ドアマンなどみんなあいさつしてくれる。
朝食はまあまあ。ZURI　EXPRESSに比べるとかなり良いと思う。
メニュー的には同じような感じだが質が良い。
コーヒーはエスプレッソがある。
エレベータのコントロールもよく、待ち時間が少ない。
部屋は広くてきれい。設備は十分。
シャワーブースのみ。
トイレはECOウォッシャー付き。
７階の角部屋だったが、電子キーが開かない時があった。
どこかの排水音が少しうるさかった。
フリーWifiが切れやすかった。
BGMよかった。
エアコンOKだった。静かでよく効く。
title: 必要十分

text:
Ho soggiornato due settimane in questo hotel nel mese di ottobre 2014 , hotel molto pulito , buon servizio ristorante , palestra e piscina a disposizione degli ospiti.
Personale qualificato e molto disponibile. 
La camera dove ho soggiornato era molto ampia ed il bagno spazioso , consiglio a chi si recherà in questo hotel di farsi assegnare la stanza , nella parte sinistra guardando l'ingresso dell'albergo.
Il consiglio è dato dal fatto che alla destra dello stesso c'è un centro di addestramento dell'esercito e la mattina tra le 5,30 e le 6,00 ti svegli anche se non vorresti
title: ottimo hotel nelle immediate vicinanze della zona industriale

text:
海外出張の際泊まりました。
となりが軍のビル。
日本人と白人利用者がメイン。ビジネス関係が多いんでしょう。

部屋床はタイル貼りで綺麗でした。
となりの部屋の音はあまり聞こえなかったです。
ＷＩＦＩ完備ですが、少し弱い気がします。ＬＡＮは無かったです。
同行した方の部屋ではエアコンがブッ潰れ一晩厚さで大変だったらしいです。
クリーニングは高い、下着類は新しく買った方が良いです。
風呂はシャワーのみ、シャワールームは水アカ的なのが少しありました。
シャンプーは買うのをオススメします。
部屋には毎日無料のミネラルウォーターが２本常備してくれてました。
プールはきれいでしたがロケーションは道路とビルが見える。
従業員は現地語、英語メイン、日本語がほんの少しできる女性がいました。
接客は悪くないですが、良くもない。

１階レストラン
朝食は無料。ビュッフェ形式、かなりの種類の食事、フルーツ、フレッシュジュースがありました。
夜は有料ですが食べれますが、ステーキは硬くてオススメしません。ナシゴレン等はいけます。
料金は日本の金額と変わらないと思います。（高い）

2Ｆラウンジ
薄暗いバーラウンジでその日ごとでシンガー、バンドが演奏しています。
（おねぇさんも出入りしています。）
金額も高い（日本人価格）です。
ここでお金使うぐらいなら、Cikarangに行きます。

周辺情報
ホテル裏にあるblisscoというカフェの店長（英語上手）がものすごく親切で、色々サービスしてくれました。食事、ビール等あります。
この店もＷＩＦＩ完備でくつろげます。
ホテル近くにちょっとしたモールみたいな中に、スーパーマーケット（酒なし）があります。
モールには衣類店、携帯屋、レストランあります。
少し歩くとマクドナルド（メニュー少ない）、INDOMARTがありますが、途中歩道路面が粗悪で歩きにくいです。
Cikarangの大きいモールまではタクシーで早くて15分ぐらい、夕方は渋滞凄いです。
jakartaまでタクシーで３０分から１時間。
title: 仕事で滞在

text:
Ho soggiornato in questo hotel per alcuni giorni per un viaggio di lavoro. Dovendo rimanere in zona, lontano da Jakarta, è un'ottima soluzione.
E' un hotel pulito ed il personale è veramente molto gentile e disponibile.
Ho anche apprezzato il ristorante interno a buffet, con ottimo cibo, curato e vario.
L'hotel è fornito anche di piscina e palestra che non ho potuto utilizzare per mancanza di tempo.
Purtroppo l'hotel si trova in una zona dove non c'è nulla, per cui è adatto solo se dovete soggiornate per lavoro. Comunque consigliato, in zona non c'è di meglio.
title: Ottimo hotel per chi si trova in zona per lavoro

text: Consiglio questo hotel innanzitutto per la comodità se si lavora da quella parte di Jakarta. L'hotel è molto ben organizzato (come standard indonesiano), camere belle, pulite e nuove. La cucina è sempre all'altezza tra ristorante italiano e giapponese. La palestra non grandissima ma fornita di diverse soluzioni con vari attrezzi. La piscina abbastanza grande per poter nuotare bene. Il personale molto disponibile e cordiale. Bravo il direttore, Mr. Jaka, simpaticissimo e sempre attento.
title: Bello anche in "periferia"

text:
Tradotto...casa mia , ci sono due soluzioni per i business traveller qui a kota cikarang , il grand zuri e' una di queste...tutto il resto e' al di sotto dello "standard" occidentale.
Personalmente mi trovo bene e proseguo la mia permanenza qui...un unico appunto che potrei fare e' la non fantasia' nel menu del ristorante...oramai la stessa da un anno...per il resto piu' che bene.
title: Rumahku

text: Hôtel très bien situé près de la zone industrielle de Jababeka à Cikarang. Bon rapport qualité/prix. Le service est impeccable, le personnel de l'hôtel est très sympathique et souriant. Petite salle de sport, spa, sauna, piscine très agréable après une journée de travail. Les chambres sont tranquilles, spacieuses et propres. Le lounge est grand avec un billard et il y a même un club au sous-sol. L'hôtel possède aussi son restaurant. Menu varié, plat typique, chinois, japonais ou européen. Je le recommande vivement si vous venez travailler sur Cikarang.
title: Hôtel à Jababeka

text:
Soggiorno di lavoro da fine gennaio fino a metà febbraio. 
Hotel situato nella zona industriale, per cui ottimo per chi come me è in viaggio per lavoro.
Hotel di nuova costruzione, le camere sono abbastanza spazione, pulite  e tenute bene.
Il personale dell'hotel è molto cordiale e sempre disponibile per soddisfare le tue esigenze. Il cibo è ottimo, sia alla carta che a buffet. Si possono trovare piatti sia tipici che una cucina internazionale comunque molto buoni entrambi. Hotel consigliato per chi come me è qui per lavoro e dista 15 min. dal polo industriale senza dover sempre fare avanti-indietro da Jakarta. 
L'hotel offre anche il servizio navetta per/da la zona industriale, si è coperti in tutto. 
Nel complesso il mio giudizio è il massimo dei voti.
title: Soggiorno di lavoro fine gennaio-febbraio 2013

text:
Ein sauberes etwas steriles Hotel. 
Liegt in einem Industriegebiet und nutzt die momentane Hotelknappheit dort aus. 
Sonst für Geschäftsreisende zu empfehlen. 
Auf keinen Fall Devisen tauschen. Kurse denkbar schlecht.
title: Hotel für Geschäftsreisen
